QuestData.Title: Smoke in Their Eyes
QuestData.Description: I'm not sure what knuckle-headed plan your friend is concocting, but we're going to need a distraction if we're to stand a chance of escaping.$B$BTake the torch from that brazier and go start some fires.$B$BPerhaps if we divert the Neferset scum's attention away for a few minutes, we'll have the opportunity we need.
QuestData.LogDescription: Burn Stacks of Hay inside the Lost City of the Tol'vir in Uldum.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes. I hear the Neferset calling each other to the east. This might yet work.
